thread.title: CBB viewers question how Bianca Gascoigne knew about boyfriend's 'pap pics and stories'
thread.title_full: CBB viewers question how Bianca Gascoigne knew about boyfriend's 'pap pics and stories'

author: Joshua Haigh
title: CBB viewers question how Bianca Gascoigne knew about boyfriend's 'pap pics and stories'
text:
CBB viewers question how Bianca Gascoigne knew about boyfriend's 'pap pics and stories' The star's former flame CJ Meeks has been talking - but she's been in the reality TV house Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bianca Gascoigne knew about boyfriend's 'pap pics and stories' Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Bianca Gascoigne has caused a stir with Celebrity Big Brother viewers after referring to her ex CJ Meeks ' behaviour while she's been in the house. 
The star was the first to be eliminated in tonight's live final, and as she was asked to clarify her status she discussed her former flame, and said she "knows" about the paparazzi pictures and interviews he has done. 
However, Aisleyne Horgan-Wallace and other viewers were quick to question this, with the Mirror Online columnist tweeting: "H h HOW does Bianca know her ex has done pap sets & stories!!! #cbb (sic)" Bianca Gascoigne (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) 
Others shared the sentiment, with another writing: "Weird how bianca new bout the pap shots and stories getting sold.... #cbb (sic)" 
However, a rep for CBB revealed that housemates are given "a very quick debrief" between exiting the house and their interview with Emma Willis. 
The blonde beauty had struck up a romance with Jamie O'Hara in the house, despite revealing recently that she's actually got a boyfriend on the outside. Viewers questioned her interview (Photo: PA) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bianca Gascoigne is sixth to be evicted in CBB final Share this video Watch Next 
While Bianca Gascoigne appeared to play down her romance with CJ Meeks when chatting with her housemates, the cage fighter has insisted that their romance is far more serious than viewers realise. 
In a heartbreaking interview, CJ has broken his silence on their relationship and claimed that he's been "destroyed" by Bianca's behaviour on the show. Read More CJ is done with Bianca (Photo: Barcroft Media) The CBB star has fallen for Jamie O'Hara (Photo: Barcroft Media) 
“It’s been like my worst nightmare come true. We were very, very happy but she has destroyed me. I feel changed as a person – Bianca was everything to me, she was my best friend, I thought she was going to be the mother of my children, but she’s ruined it all – and what for, Jamie O’Hara? 
“I genuinely don’t know what she’s going to do when she comes out and I don’t care – I’m gone.” CJ planned to propose (Photo: Instagram/biancagascoigne1) Read More Comment Below 
Shockingly, the muscled bloke claims that Bianca had been asking him for a ring recently and he was all but set to propose to her when she leaves the CBB house on Friday night. 
“Bianca was always asking me ‘where’s my ring?’ Lots of our friends were getting engaged and I had it all ready for her. I said when she came home to me the diamond was waiting for her – that was the plan,” he explained. 
Talking about his heartbreak, he told The Sun that he's moved out of the couple's home and has changed his number so the blonde star won't ever be able to contact him again. Jamie's fallen for Bianca (Photo: Supplied by WENN) 
“I was inconsolable for days, I couldn’t stop crying and I was still sitting in our flat, on our sofa, watching her climb into bed with another guy. It’s been like torture.” 
"I’ve moved out of our flat, I’ve given the keys back to the concierge, I’ve changed my number and I’ve blocked all her friends and family on social media, " he added. Read More The pair have become intimate on the show Read More 
We doubt that CJ will be happy about the latest shocking claims suggesting that Bianca and Jamie have been sneaking off to have sex in the CBB toilets . 
John and Edward Grimes – aka Jedward – piped up this week about missing condoms, leading viewers to imagine just who in the house might have been using them. 
However, neither Bianca or Jamie have admitted to getting frisky out of sight of the rest of the housemates – at least, not in any scenes aired by Channel 5. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
